question: A warning has been issued recently in Odisha regarding a cyclone. What is the name of the cyclone?
explanation: The Odisha government has put 15 of the state\'s 30 districts on alert to deal with a possible flood-like situation due to the depression over Bay of Bengal .The depression,named bulbul moved westwards and lay centred over east-central and adjoining southeast Bay of Bengal and North Andaman Sea, about 890 km south-southeast of Paradip in Odisha and 980 km south-southeast of Sagar Islands in West Bengal. Fishermen have been advised not to venture into the sea along and off Odisha-West Bengal coasts.
